name: The Legend of Zolt (demo available)
description:
You are Zolt! Progress through this retro-inspired action adventure game and complete the dungeon of 12 rooms and beat the boss in a record time.

Your playtime and the number of deaths are recorded via auto save !

You can play in French or English, 

I update the game daily ! All updates are free to download for people who already paid the game.

The project started April 11th of 2022, and I  worked 77hours on it (about 7-8hrs a day) to get here using only Playdate Pulp. All of the room designs are finished, but I steel need to new AI and to program puzzles of rooms 7, 9 and 12.

My current goal is just to finish this dungeon nad then polish the game a bit. I want to keep supporting the game, but I am only doing that during my free time as a hobby, and it takes a lot of time.. if this game sells a bit, I would like to add 3 other (bigger) dungeons and a "Final Boss".

-Ask me before, if you are planning to use my work in your game-
